entry.title: tlevine/plots
entry.summary:
Plots for your shell

Histograms

Plot a histogram given a file or stdin.

USAGE: hist [breaks] [file]

Plot a histogram.

$ echo 1.3 1.2 3.4 4 2.8 3 6.2 | hist 2

4   *
3   *
2 * *
1 * * *
  2 4 6

If you don't specify the breaks, we use my tick algorithm to choose about eight ticks. It would look like this, except this isn't the actual algorithm output.

$ echo 1.3 1.2 3.4 4 2.8 3 6.2 | hist

4     *
3     *
2 *   *
1 *   * *   *
  1 2 3 4 5 6

Bar plot

Given a factor variable, plot a bar plot

USAGE: bar [file]

$ echo duck duck goose | bar

2 -----
1 ----- -----
  duck  goose
